rows.label: qst200911_msg001
rows.name:
Otto! You were late,
did something happen?

rows.label: qst200911_msg002
rows.name:
Yeah, a small problem came up,
but these people helped me out.

rows.label: qst200911_msg003
rows.name:
By the way, you guys had some
business with me, right?

rows.label: qst200911_msg004
rows.name:
That's right! We wanted
to ask for your help!

rows.label: qst200911_msg005
rows.name:
The windmill at Tuuli
Bakery has broken down.

rows.label: qst200911_msg006
rows.name:
They can't operate if they can't
grind flour, so we'd like to ask
Otto-san to repair the windmill.

rows.label: qst200911_msg007
rows.name:
...I see, so that's what it
is. Sure, I don't mind.

rows.label: qst200911_msg009
rows.name:
Yeah, as thanks for saving me.
I'll take a look at it for free.

rows.label: qst200911_msg014
rows.name:
I'll head over to Tuuli Bakery first,
so you guys come along later.
